Name: Variable
About the game: Variable is a real-time card game. The goal of the game is to score more points than the opponent. The player must take cards from the common deck. When the deck is over, points are counted. There are five types of cards. If the card is repeated, then the move is transferred to another player. There are special cards in the deck: 1 - Take any enemy card. 2 - The game is transferred to another player. The game continues until the third defeat. You can play with a computer or another player.
